mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOMEWORK (TITLE, TASK, CLASS_NO, TEACHER_Id, REGISTER_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{title}, #{task}, #{classNo}, #{teacherId}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT NO, TITLE, TASK, CLASS_NO, TEACHER_ID, REGISTER_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM HOMEWORK WHERE TEACHER_ID LIKE '%${teacherId}%'
SELECT NO, TITLE, TASK, CLASS_NO, TEACHER_ID, REGISTER_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM HOMEWORK WHERE NO = #{no}
SELECT NO, TITLE, TASK, CLASS_NO, TEACHER_ID, REGISTER_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM HOMEWORK WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo} ORDER BY REGISTER_DATE DESC LIMIT 5
